attributes.action: call an immediate general election due to widespread expenses fiddling by MPs.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: General election to be called in July, or there abouts. The public no longer have any confidence in the political system, or any of the politicians within it. We ask that the PM has the courgae to use the "clean sweep" approach, allowing the system to recover and confidence to be regained.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
